item.description:
No waterskiing is what I am thinking. I needed to change this the the morning. Another possibility is to move this to the next day/eveving. Lets hope for good weather.

Meet at Charles River boat ramp near the Newton/Watertown line. It will be maybe 2-3 hours.Â  Just call my mobile if you happen to have time for a cruise to the Longfellow Bridge and back. M 617 6 3 3 6187
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at my house or at the ramp on the Charles in Newton, next to Community Boating Or call me.for pickup along the Charles River in Boston/Cambridge.
item.name: Cruise the Charles River Sat
